pages.text: Desiccation is a state that vampires enter when they are severely weakened and have lost their blood supply. It is a debilitating condition that can leave a vampire weakened and vulnerable.

pages.title: Weaknesses
pages.text: During the desiccation process, the vampire will be severely weakened and unable to use their abilities. If a vampire is left in this state for too long, they become fully desiccated.

pages.title: Desiccated State
pages.text: When a vampire is fully desiccated, they will be unable to move or use any abilities. The only way to recover from this state is to feed on blood.

pages.title: Recovery
pages.text: To recover from desiccation, a vampire must feed on blood. This will restore their strength and allow them to regain their abilities.
